grow_event_type_poison/3901_1301_0100_10:
Alola! I’m going to train with Burgh. Would you
like to join us?
grow_event_type_poison/3902_1031_0100_10:
I want to sketch out an
extraordinary battle...
grow_event_type_poison/3902_1301_0100_10:
I’m going to come at you with my full power,
[Name:PlayerNickname ], so don’t you hold
back, either!
grow_event_type_poison/3903_1031_0100_10:
A good battle might give
me some inspiration...
grow_event_type_poison/3903_1301_0100_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
I’m hoping to get some good inspiration from
my battle with you!
